name: UnderHull
description:
You aren't in Hull anymore... you're in UnderHull now...

UnderHull takes place in a strange, disturbing version of the city of Hull. It's a game of demons, mages, exploding cats and evil cultists. A game you can play... if you dare...

A game made by young people on the Goodwin Development Trust's Youth Arts Takeover project, this game uses a combination of RPG maker's default assets and customised character sprites, battle sprites and music.

Currently only available for windows. We're investigating the potential for other versions to be made, so stay tuned!
